mapper.select: select ma.* from tbl_member_alarm ma inner join tbl_member m on ma.midx = m.midx where m.MemberId = #{sessionId} and m.MemberName = #{sessionName} order by madate desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member_alarm (maidx, midx, macontent, madate) values ( MALARM_SEQ.nextval, (select midx from tbl_member where memberid = #{MemberId}), #{MaContent}, sysdate )
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_member_alarm where maidx = #{maidx, jdbcType=INTEGER}
